item.description:
We've rescheduled the meeting from tonight to this Wednesday. It was such short notice.

It's important to hear from as many volunteers as possible about what you felt worked and what did not work, to come up with solutions and ideas for future similar events.

Again this call is open to everyone, not just volunteers.

(605) 990-0015, access code 771-858-638
Meeting ID: 771-858-638

barbara g.
item.name: Rescheduled Oyster Festival Booth "Post Mortem" Call
